root.name: Dance Dance Revolution USA
root.description: This release is notable for updating the aging song list in the original DDR to include songs featured Japanese arcade machines 2ndMix and 3rdMix. The European Dancing Stage EuroMix arcade release served a similar purpose and has a similar song list as well.Songs20,November -D.D.R.
